item.title: War in iraq sniper video
item.dc:creator: @Exernet Exernet
item.description:
@Exernet wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:13, topic:20382”][quote author=Exernet link=topic=30950.msg370037#msg370037 date=1162159602]

Moslims are fags…

You’re an idiot, the people killing our soldiers are terrorists/Saddam followers… I hate it when people stereotype Muslims. It shows how ignorant you are, not even knowing who were at war with.

If a serial killer is American, does that make America serial killers? No.
If a terrorist is Muslim, does that make Muslims terrorists? No, so stfu.

Sadly, this shit happens daily… You just don’t hear it from the mainstream media.

[/quote]
You can call me an idiot, I dont care. But every muslim in our country is a problem. They steal, do nothing and live from the taxes whe pay and dont bother learning our language and customs. I didnt mean saying fags because some of them are terrorists, I ment in general they are. Unless their in their own country doing normal. :|[/quote]

Are you kidding me? The Muslims that make it to the US are usually doctors, professors, etc. and trying to escape what’s going on overseas. If you’re going to stereotype someone by their religion then you don’t belong in the US imo.

This thread should be moved to the debates forum… Or actually, it should be locked… I don’t think anyone wants to see soldiers get shot, it’s sickening.
